EmailTemplate.name: 202005_BK_Webinar_SocialFlight_live-event-Joe-Coraggio.1.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join BendixKing’s Gregg Cohen and air race pilot Joe Coraggio on “SocialFlight Live!”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join BendixKing’s Gregg Cohen and air race pilot Joe Coraggio on “SocialFlight Live!”
Date: Tuesday, May 26th, 2020, 5:00 p.m. PST / 8:00 p.m. EST
“SocialFlight Live!” is a weekly livestream talk show supporting General Aviation during the crisis. Previous guests have included SR-71 Pilots, EAA President Jack Pelton, Michael Goulian, Rob Holland, Julie Clark, Martha King and more.
Join Gregg Cohen, President of BendixKing, along with award-winning air race pilot Joe Coraggio for an open discussion around the future of general aviation, Joe’s racing experience with BendixKing avionics, Gregg’s vision for BendixKing and how it is leading the charge to help move the future of general aviation forward.
Save the date and connect with us! Feel free to share this event. REGISTER HERE <[[http://www.socialflightlive.com/]]> Be sure to click on the May 26th Live Event.
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, your webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner.
